column5: I really want to take my son camping  sometime in April. Can anyone suggest a place I can get a campsite(tent) on Rice lake that's open in April?
i think you can tent at golden beach cottages.
Can check these places out.   Not sure what's open though.  http://www.ricelakecanada.com/amenities.htm
Try sunsetcove resort. Took the trailer last June. Was awesome.
